function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of COVID-19 media articles from Jan 2020 to May 2020","Impact":"Outdated information leading to incorrect analysis or conclusions","Mitigation":"Update the dataset with the latest information on COVID-19","Technologies":"Data scraping tools for real-time information retrieval","People":"Researchers, analysts, and policymakers relying on the dataset","Owner":"Data collection and analysis team"},{"Description":"Data cleaning and preprocessing using regex library","Impact":"Incomplete removal of distracting characters or important information","Mitigation":"Manual review of the cleaned data to ensure important information is retained","Technologies":"Natural language processing tools for text cleaning and preprocessing","People":"Data scientists, analysts, and researchers performing the data cleaning","Owner":"Data preprocessing team"},{"Description":"Training models using python libraries","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased topic modeling results","Mitigation":"Validation of model results with human interpretation and domain knowledge","Technologies":"Python libraries for machine learning and natural language processing","People":"Data scientists, machine learning engineers, and researchers training the models","Owner":"Model training team"}]}
